      • getJarDir

        public static File getJarDir(Class aclass)
        Compute the absolute file path to the jar file. The framework is based on http://stackoverflow.com/a/12733172/1614775 But that gets it right for only one of the four cases.
        Parameters:
        aclass - A class residing in the required jar.
        Returns:
        A File object for the directory in which the jar file resides. During testing with NetBeans, the result is ./build/classes/, which is the directory containing what will be in the jar.
